collectible.title: Coin Purse
collectible.subtitle: A Plump Pouch of Gold
collectible.text: You won strip poker! The cash prize is yours! Except there was no cash prize, but Anna felt bad, so she gave you one anyway. Oh... there's a note inside... It reads: "There's more where this came from if you come back under an alias. But you'll never guess the password!"
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Anna, the Elusive Merchant.

collectible.title: Member Card
collectible.subtitle: Membership to the Secret Shop
collectible.text: A secret card granting access to the mysterious secret shop. Given only to those Anna trusts deeply. Allows you to earn AnnaCoins and unlock more collectibles! (Coming soon!)
collectible.unlock: Play a game under an alias that matches a name on Anna's membership list.
